tool_description: Analyzes storage utilization, calculates space savings from cleanup operations, and provides storage capacity planning insights.

storage_locations.description: Storage paths to analyze for space utilization

cleanup_plan_id.description: Optional cleanup plan ID to calculate space savings

error_messages: Storage location not accessible: Ensure all paths in storage_locations are valid and accessible.
Cleanup plan not found: The specified cleanup_plan_id does not exist.
Storage locations limit exceeded: Maximum 100 storage locations can be analyzed simultaneously.
usage: Provide storage_locations array to analyze current space usage. Optionally specify cleanup_plan_id to calculate potential space savings from planned cleanup operations.

current_usage.description: Current space usage for each location in format: path|total_gb|used_gb|free_gb|usage_percent

projected_savings.description: Projected space savings if cleanup plan is executed

capacity_warnings.description: Warnings about storage locations approaching capacity limits

analysis_summary.description: Overall storage analysis summary with recommendations
